availableItems.name: Acid (vial)
availableItems.description: A vial of corrosive liquid that can be thrown as an improvised weapon, dealing 2d6 acid damage on a direct hit.

availableItems.name: Alchemist's Fire (flask)
availableItems.description: A flask of volatile liquid that ignites when exposed to air. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

availableItems.name: Arrows (20)
availableItems.description: A bundle of 20 arrows, fletched for stability and tipped with arrowheads.

availableItems.name: Crossbow Bolts (20)
availableItems.description: A bundle of 20 short, heavy projectiles for use with a crossbow.

availableItems.name: Ball Bearings (bag of 1,000)
availableItems.description: A small pouch containing 1,000 tiny, hard metal balls. Can cover a 10-foot square, making the surface difficult terrain.

availableItems.name: Bedroll
availableItems.description: A simple roll of bedding, easily carried and providing a comfortable place to rest during travels.

availableItems.name: Bell
availableItems.description: A small, handheld brass bell that creates a clear ringing sound when shaken.

availableItems.name: Blanket
availableItems.description: A warm, woolen blanket, often used for an extra layer of warmth when resting.

availableItems.name: Block and Tackle
availableItems.description: A set of pulleys and rope designed to lift heavy objects. It multiplies the user's effective lifting strength by four.

availableItems.name: Book
availableItems.description: A bound volume with a heavy leather cover, containing lore, poetry, history, or simply blank pages.

availableItems.name: Caltrops (bag of 20)
availableItems.description: A small bag of four-pronged iron spikes designed to injure and slow down pursuers when scattered on the ground.

availableItems.name: Candle
availableItems.description: A wax candle that sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet for 1 hour.

availableItems.name: Chain (10 feet)
availableItems.description: A 10-foot length of heavy iron chain. Can be burst with a successful DC 20 Strength check.

availableItems.name: Climber's Kit
availableItems.description: A kit that includes special pitons, boot tips, gloves, and a harness. Allows you to add your proficiency bonus to checks made to climb.

availableItems.name: Crowbar
availableItems.description: A heavy iron bar with a flattened end, used as a lever. Grants advantage on Strength checks involving leverage.

availableItems.name: Holy Symbol, Amulet
availableItems.description: A silver amulet depicting the symbol of a deity, worn to channel divine power.

availableItems.name: Holy Water (flask)
availableItems.description: Water blessed by a priest. A flask can be thrown to deal 2d6 radiant damage to fiends or undead.

availableItems.name: Hunting Trap
availableItems.description: A heavy mechanical trap with steel jaws designed to clamp down on a creature that steps on its pressure plate.

availableItems.name: Lock
availableItems.description: A sturdy metal lock, complete with a key. A character proficient with thieves' tools can pick it.

availableItems.name: Mess Kit
availableItems.description: A tin box containing a cup and simple cutlery. It keeps your food and drink separate from your other gear.

availableItems.name: Oil (flask)
availableItems.description: A flask of viscous, flammable oil. Can be used to light a fire, cover a 5-foot square to create difficult terrain, or be thrown to douse a target.

availableItems.name: Quiver
availableItems.description: A leather container for holding arrows or crossbow bolts. Can hold up to 20 arrows.

availableItems.name: Spyglass
availableItems.description: A collapsible tube with lenses for magnifying distant objects, making them appear twice as large.

availableItems.name: Tent, Two-Person
availableItems.description: A simple canvas tent that provides shelter from the elements for up to two medium creatures.

availableItems.name: Waterskin
availableItems.description: A sealed leather bag used to carry liquid, usually water. Holds up to 4 pints.

availableItems.name: Club
availableItems.description: A simple but effective bludgeoning weapon, essentially a heavy piece of wood.

availableItems.name: Dagger
availableItems.description: A small, sharp blade with a pointed tip, good for close quarters or as a thrown weapon.

availableItems.name: Greatclub
availableItems.description: A massive, two-handed club, often studded with nails or wrapped in metal.

availableItems.name: Handaxe
availableItems.description: A small axe that can be wielded with one hand or thrown effectively.

availableItems.name: Javelin
availableItems.description: A light spear designed primarily to be thrown.

availableItems.name: Light Hammer
availableItems.description: A small hammer that can be used as a melee weapon or thrown.

availableItems.name: Mace
availableItems.description: A bludgeoning weapon with a heavy head on the end of a handle, designed to crush armor.

availableItems.name: Quarterstaff
availableItems.description: A long, sturdy staff of wood, useful as a walking aid and a versatile weapon.

availableItems.name: Sickle
availableItems.description: A tool with a curved blade, used for harvesting but also effective as a weapon.

availableItems.name: Spear
availableItems.description: A pole weapon with a pointed head, can be used one-handed or thrown.

availableItems.name: Light Crossbow
availableItems.description: A ranged weapon that is easier to load and handle than its heavier counterpart.

availableItems.name: Dart
availableItems.description: A small, weighted projectile with a sharp point, designed for throwing.

availableItems.name: Shortbow
availableItems.description: A light and flexible bow, easier to handle than a longbow, suitable for skirmishing.

availableItems.name: Sling
availableItems.description: A simple weapon consisting of a leather strap used to hurl bullets or stones.

availableItems.name: Battleaxe
availableItems.description: A versatile axe that can be wielded with one or two hands.

availableItems.name: Flail
availableItems.description: A weapon consisting of a striking head attached to a handle by a flexible chain.

availableItems.name: Glaive
availableItems.description: A long polearm with a single-edged blade at the tip, known for its reach.

availableItems.name: Greataxe
availableItems.description: A large, two-handed axe known for its devastating chopping power.

availableItems.name: Greatsword
availableItems.description: A massive two-handed sword, valued for its long reach and heavy cutting blows.

availableItems.name: Halberd
availableItems.description: A two-handed pole weapon with an axe blade and a spike mounted on the end.

availableItems.name: Lance
availableItems.description: A long weapon for thrusting, designed for use while mounted.

availableItems.name: Longsword
availableItems.description: A versatile and sharp-edged sword that can be wielded with one or two hands.

availableItems.name: Maul
availableItems.description: A massive two-handed hammer, designed for maximum blunt force trauma.

availableItems.name: Morningstar
availableItems.description: A brutal weapon consisting of a spiked head mounted on a shaft.

availableItems.name: Pike
availableItems.description: An extremely long pole weapon used by infantry formations, requiring two hands.

availableItems.name: Rapier
availableItems.description: A slender, sharply pointed sword, ideal for thrusting and fencing.

availableItems.name: Scimitar
availableItems.description: A light, curved, single-edged sword, known for its slashing attacks.

availableItems.name: Shortsword
availableItems.description: A light, double-edged sword, easy to handle and effective for quick strikes.

availableItems.name: Trident
availableItems.description: A three-pronged spear that can be used for thrusting in melee or thrown.

availableItems.name: War Pick
availableItems.description: A weapon with a sharp, curved spike designed to puncture heavy armor.

availableItems.name: Warhammer
availableItems.description: A versatile hammer with a heavy head, useful for both bludgeoning and piercing attacks.

availableItems.name: Whip
availableItems.description: A long, flexible lash with a handle, notable for its extended reach.

availableItems.name: Blowgun
availableItems.description: A long tube through which a needle-like dart can be propelled by breath.

availableItems.name: Hand Crossbow
availableItems.description: A small crossbow that can be fired with one hand.

availableItems.name: Heavy Crossbow
availableItems.description: A powerful but slow-to-load ranged weapon that fires bolts with deadly force.

availableItems.name: Longbow
availableItems.description: A large, powerful bow that requires significant strength to use effectively, known for its long range.

availableItems.name: Net
availableItems.description: A thrown weapon that can entangle a foe, restricting their movement.

availableItems.name: Padded Armor
availableItems.description: Layers of quilted cloth, offering minimal protection but without hindering movement. Gives disadvantage on Stealth checks.

availableItems.name: Leather Armor
availableItems.description: Armor made from hardened leather, offering basic protection with minimal hindrance to movement.

availableItems.name: Studded Leather Armor
availableItems.description: Leather armor reinforced with close-set rivets or studs, offering better protection than standard leather.

availableItems.name: Hide Armor
availableItems.description: Armor crafted from the thick hides and furs of beasts, offering moderate protection.

availableItems.name: Chain Shirt
availableItems.description: A shirt of interlocking metal rings, covering the torso while leaving the limbs free.

availableItems.name: Scale Mail
availableItems.description: A coat and leggings of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, like fish scales.

availableItems.name: Breastplate
availableItems.description: A solid metal plate that covers the torso, offering excellent protection for the vital organs.

availableItems.name: Half Plate
availableItems.description: Armor consisting of shaped metal plates that cover most of the body, offering good protection.

availableItems.name: Ring Mail
availableItems.description: Leather armor with heavy rings sewn into it, offering inferior protection to chain mail.

availableItems.name: Chain Mail
availableItems.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, Chain Mail provides substantial protection against attacks.

availableItems.name: Splint Armor
availableItems.description: Armor made of narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a leather backing.

availableItems.name: Plate Armor
availableItems.description: A full suit of interlocking metal plates, offering the best possible protection.

availableItems.name: Shield
availableItems.description: A standard wooden or metal shield, carried in one hand to intercept attacks.

availableItems.name: Abacus
availableItems.description: A wooden frame with rows of wires, on which beads are slid for calculation.

availableItems.name: Alchemist's Supplies
availableItems.description: A kit including beakers, metal frames, and glass stirring rods for creating alchemical substances.

availableItems.name: Brewer's Supplies
availableItems.description: A kit containing a large glass jug, hops, a siphon, and tubing for brewing beer and ale.

availableItems.name: Backpack
availableItems.description: A sturdy leather or canvas bag for carrying supplies, worn on the back. Can hold 1 cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear.

availableItems.name: Barrel
availableItems.description: A large wooden barrel. Can hold 40 gallons of liquid or 4 cubic feet of solid material.

availableItems.name: Chest
availableItems.description: A wooden chest for storing items. Can hold 12 cubic feet or 300 pounds of gear.

availableItems.name: Calligrapher's Supplies
availableItems.description: A kit containing ink, a dozen sheets of parchment, and three quills.

availableItems.name: Carpenter's Tools
availableItems.description: A kit containing a saw, a hammer, nails, a hatchet, a square, a ruler, an adze, a plane, and a chisel.

availableItems.name: Cartographer's Tools
availableItems.description: A kit containing a quill, ink, parchment, a pair of compasses, calipers, and a ruler.

availableItems.name: Diamond
availableItems.description: A brilliant, transparent, and exceptionally hard gemstone of immense value.

availableItems.name: Flour (1 lb.)
availableItems.description: A small sack containing one pound of ground flour.

availableItems.name: Hourglass
availableItems.description: A glass instrument that measures a one-hour period when sand flows from an upper bulb to a lower one.

availableItems.name: Potion of Healing
availableItems.description: A vial of shimmering red liquid that restores 2d4 + 2 hit points when consumed.

availableItems.name: Rope, Hempen (50 feet)
availableItems.description: A 50-foot coil of sturdy, thick rope.

availableItems.name: Thieves' Tools
availableItems.description: A small kit containing a file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror, a pair of scissors, and pliers.

availableItems.name: Tinderbox
availableItems.description: A small container holding flint, fire steel, and tinder used to kindle a flame.

availableItems.name: Torch
availableItems.description: A wooden rod tipped with cloth soaked in a flammable substance. Provides bright light for one hour.
